reference: Smith, Josephine M. and John B. Taylor (2007), The Link between the Long End and the Short End of Policy Rules, Stanford University.
Judd, John and Bharat Trehan (1995), Has the Fed Gotten Tougher on Inflation? The FRBSF Weekly Letter, March 31, 1995, Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.
Patinkin, Don (1965), Money, Interest and Prices, Harper and Row, New York.
Fuhrer, Jeffrey (1996) Monetary Policy Shifts and Long-Term Interest Rates Quarterly Journal of Economics, 111,4, pp. 1183-1209.
Engel, Charles, Nelson Mark, and Kenneth West (2007), Exchange Rate Models are Not as Bad as You Think, NBER Macroeconomic Annual 2007.
Engel, Charles and Kenneth West (2006), Taylor Rules and the Deutsche-Dollar Real Exchange Rate, Journal of Money Credit and Banking, 38, 1175-1194.
Ang, Andrew, Sen Dong, and Monika Piazzesi, (2005) No Arbitrage Taylor Rules Chicago Business School.
Bernanke, Ben (2004), The Great Moderation, Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.
